definitions.text: someone who settles lawfully on government land with the intent to acquire title to it
someone who settles on land without right or title
short and thick; as e.g. having short legs and heavy musculature
examples: some people seem born to be square and chunky
a dumpy little dumpling of a woman
dachshunds are long lowset dogs with drooping ears
a little church with a squat tower

definitions.text: having a low center of gravity; built low to the ground
